rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance ensuring clear visibility upon entry with auspicious direction.
Large open-plan area merging living and dining space with abundant natural light from north-facing windows.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen integrated into the living area to promote ease of flow, with south facing windows ensuring proper ventilation.
Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light from east-facing windows; designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu principles to ensure calm and positive energy.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy, with south-east orientation for balanced energy flow.
Multipurpose study and bathroom area integrated to optimize space usage and maintain natural light
Open terrace space designed for relaxation and to enhance natural ventilation; follows Vastu guidelines with west orientation promoting positive energy.
